name: Melisa
comment: The Jogger is an engaging car to drive, thanks to the effort that Dacia has made to keep it light.

name: Ashley Red Rose Bouquet
comment: It’s all very clever – a lower weight means a smaller engine does the same job, and it gives some breathing space for a more generous spec sheet, at least by the company’s usual standards.

name: Helene Ros
comment: There will always be features you could add, but slimming down means tough decisions have to be made.

name: Nadine Pink Carnation Flower Box
comment: The low weight is the key to unlocking the car’s performance, though.

name: Red Roses
comment: Leasing.com Group Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.

name: Maria
comment: You will not own the car. Eligibility criteria & terms apply. Advance, duration & mileage terms shown on Leasing.com.

name: Red Carnation Sprays
comment: We never thought we’d be extolling the virtues of a cut price Dacia people mover as the last

name: Kate Red Rose Flower Box
comment: The 11.2secs 0–62mph time is hardly nippy but 47.1mpg isn’t to be sniffed at in a powertrain
